content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable Using the excerpt, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly identify ONE cause of the development in the excerpt. Briefly describe ONE argument made in the excerpt. Briefly describe one similarity between the Native American actions depicted in the excerpt and Native American actions in another European colony or colonial region.
